attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in any current member of parliament
attributes.additional_details:
The UK has become a laughing stock worldwide during the last 3 years. MP's are elected to act on behalf of their constituents. A referendum was held, the result was binding, parliament voted to trigger article 50 and has since done everything in its power to stall and delay this result.
This isn't a "best of 3" game. We should leave on October 31st!
attributes.background: Due to parliament being unable to agree on anything regarding Brexit it's time that ALL current MP's are relieved of their duties and a new parliament is elected. A parliament that actually listens to the electorate!

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.
If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
